metadata.name: The Burning of Innocence #1/3
metadata.description:
The streets are ablaze with hatred and fear,
A cycle of chaos that will never veer.

The air is thick with the smell of ire,
As people succumb to radical desires.

It's a cycle of violence and despair,
Seeking solace in an atmosphere so rare.

The innocent victims pay the ultimate price,
For those who seek out hate and strife.

But even in this cloud of darkness,
A light can still appear in starkness.
